entry.title: Sunday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5 except high 9 inland.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Rain beginning late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 5 except high 9 inland. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
